entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Manan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:25 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Manan 04:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: SW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
